title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1045.13 - Unauthorized interference with or use of systems or equipment prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1045.13 - Unauthorized interference with or use of systems or equipment prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall do or permit to be done anything which may
interfere with the effectiveness or accessibility of the fire protection
system, sprinkler system, drainage system, alarm system, telephone system, electrical system, public announcement and intercommunications system, plumbing
system, lighting system, security system, air-conditioning system, ventilation
system, fire hydrants, hoses, fire extinguishers, towing equipment or other
mechanical systems or equipment installed or located at the transit center or
on a bus, including closed circuit television cameras and monitors, radios, signs and notices; nor shall any person operate, adjust or otherwise handle or
manipulate, without permission, any of the aforesaid systems or portions
thereof, or any machinery, equipment or other devices installed or located at
the transit center or on a bus. Tags showing date of last inspection attached
to units of fire extinguishing and fire-fighting equipment shall not be removed
therefrom; nor shall any person plug a television, radio or other electrical
device into any outlet or connect any device to any utility at or in the
transit center. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1045.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
